Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Troy in 1974...
Injured on 8/31/1980 with a Spasms Back, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/1981 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/20/1982...
Injured on 8/1/1982 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 4/25/1983 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1985, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1985, going 6-0, 1.09...
Injured on 6/3/1986 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1987, off Darryl Payne (PG)...
